text: Ambience Mall, Gurgaon is a shopping mall in Gurgaon, Haryana, India. It contains a built-up area of 21 lakhs square feet and a retail (GLA) area of 18 lakhs square feet. Most floors have a shopping area of 860 meters. Ambience Mall has more than 230 stores and food outlets. Its parking space can accommodate about 4000 vehicles. The mall was opened for public in 2007. It has won the "Best Shopping Center of the Year" and "Most Admired Shopping Centre of the Year" awards. It is one of India's largest shopping malls and one of the most famous shopping malls in Asia. == References == Category:Shopping malls in Haryana Category:Buildings and structures in Gurgaon Category:Economy of Gurgaon Category:Shopping malls established in 2007 Category:2007 establishments in India
title: Ambience Mall Gurgaon
